meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to be easily annoyed or angered.
meanings.sent1: She is the chippiest person in our group, always getting upset over small things.
meanings.sent2: The chippiest customer at the store demanded to speak to the manager.
meanings.sent3: When the chippiest squirrel in the park lost its nut, it threw a tiny tantrum.
meanings.sent4: His chippiest mood was like a storm brewing on a sunny day, ready to burst at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The chippiest cat in the neighborhood hissed at anyone who came near its favorite spot.

meanings.definition: Having the most chips or wood shavings.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used the chippiest wood for his intricate carvings.
meanings.sent2: The chippiest table in the workshop had a rough texture due to the excess wood shavings.
meanings.sent3: The chippiest floor in the cabin made it look rustic and cozy.
meanings.sent4: The chippiest sculpture in the exhibit resembled a forest scene with its detailed wood shavings.
meanings.sent5: The chippiest fence in the yard needed sanding to smooth out the rough edges.

meanings.definition: In a state of being full of energy or enthusiasm.
meanings.sent1: After a good night's sleep, she woke up feeling the chippiest she had in weeks.
meanings.sent2: The chippiest puppy at the shelter wagged its tail non-stop, eager to play.
meanings.sent3: The chippiest child in the class bounced around with excitement for the upcoming field trip.
meanings.sent4: His chippiest performance on stage captivated the audience with his vibrant energy.
meanings.sent5: The chippiest team in the league celebrated their victory with high-fives and cheers.
